document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph: • In: Sitzungsberichten der Österreichischen Akademie der Wissenschaften .
• In: Denkschriften der Schweizerischen Naturforschenden Gesellschaft , 84: 106.
Irish Records : Pasture ( Purvis, 1978; upublished data ); Fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ; unpublished data).

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Pachylaelaps furcifer Oudemans
( Valarasan, 1971 ; Whel- an, 1976). Irish Records : Pasture ( Valarasan, 1971 ); pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ). Counties: Dublin , Kildare .

•
Pachylaelaps ensifer Oudemans, 1902
• Original name:
Pachylaelaps ensifer Oudemans, 1902
. • In: Tijdschrift voor Entomologie , 45: 52. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Pachylaelaps pectinifer
var
magnus Halbert
( Halbert,
Irish Records : In moss ( Halbert, 1915 ); soil under Norway spruce ( Heneghan, 1994 ).

bibRefCitation.author: Halbert, J. N.
bibRefCitation.refString: Halbert, J. N. (1915) Clare Island survey. 39. Acaridina ii. Terrestrial and marine Acarina. Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy, 31 (39), 45 - 136.

subSubSection.paragraph: • In : Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy , 31: 64.
Irish Records : Under stones on gravel and sandy mud on seashore ( Halbert, 1915 , 1920 ).

bibRefCitation.author: Halbert, J. N.
bibRefCitation.refString: Halbert, J. N. (1915) Clare Island survey. 39. Acaridina ii. Terrestrial and marine Acarina. Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy, 31 (39), 45 - 136.

subSubSection.paragraph: • In : Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy , 31: 65.

Irish Records : Decaying tree trunk ( Halbert, 1915 ); bracken bed, gorse bank and
Salix
ditch at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ); rough grazing and broadleaved forest soils (
Arroyo et al ., 2009
; unpublished data); Machair grassland and associated fore dunes (
Arroyo et al ., 2011
); spruce woodland (unpublished data); soil under oak, Sitka spruce and Scots pine, moss on soil surface under oak (
Arroyo et al ., 2012
, 2013a ).
Counties: Carlow, Dublin, Galway, Kerry, Kildare, Mayo, Waterford, Wexford, Wicklow .

•
Pachylaelaps pectinifer (G. Canestrini, 1881)
• Original name:
Gamasus pectinifer G. Canestrini, 1881
. • In: Atti del Reale Istituto veneto di scienze , lettere ed arti , Series 5 , 7: 513. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Pachylaelaps sellnicki Hirschmann & Krauss ( Heneghan,
Irish Records : Soil under Norway spruce ( Heneghan, 1994 ).

Original name :
Pachylaelaps ( Pachylaelaps ) resinae Karg, 1971
.

bibRefCitation.author: Evans, G. O. & Hyatt, K. H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Evans, G. O. & Hyatt, K. H. (1956) British mites of the genus Pachylaelaps. Entomologists' Monthly Magazine, 92, 118 - 129.

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Original name :
Pachylaelaps undulatus Evans & Hyatt, 1956
.

• In :
Bulletin du Musée Royal d’Histoire Naturelle de Belgique
, 11: 20.
Irish Records : Pasture ( Curry, 1969a ); soil under Norway spruce ( Heneghan, 1994 ); soil in birch, mixed conifer and mixed broadleaved woodland (unpublished data); cliff (Bolger, in press).
Counties: Dublin, Kildare, Kilkenny, Mayo, Wexford .

bibRefCitation.author: Berlese, A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Berlese, A. (1906) Monografia del genere Gamasus Latr. Redia, 3, 66 - 304.

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Pseudolaelaps doderoi Solari (
Arroyo et al ., 2015
)
.

Irish Records : Nest of
Lasius flavus (
Arroyo et al ., 2015
)
.
